|sometimes they require you to be a certain|profession or have a certain weapon|equipped... I know it's a bit of a hassle,|
|but in that case, just make sure you meet all|the requirements and your strength is above|the target, then report back to me... I've|

|challenge...

|allow changes in strength that disappear|after a certain amount of time, like the|effects of eating food... If you're a little|
|short of your goal, you might want to rethink|the alchemy effect or try synthesizing|accessories...

55.<pipipi_mid>|「よう <pc>。| いいところに 来てくれたぜ！|<:
|Yo, ! Nice to see you.|
|Why don't you join me for a little training?|This is the Road to Perfection, and is meant|to guide you to the height of your abilities.|
|It's easy to explain. First, I'll show you|the different Roads you can take and the|challenges each one has.|
|If the specified stat is equal to or higher|than the challenge's target stat value, you'll|clear it.|
|Each time you complete a challenge, the next|one'll open up. Keep this up, and you'll|eventually reach the ultimate challenge.|
|So, whadd'ya think? Don't you want to reach|that ultimate challenge too, ?

|challenge to the strength of the greatest|heroes of all time. But this goal is really|hard, and it's only a challenge... You don't|
|have to do it. It's... So I'll give you this|so you can check your goals and report back|to me whenever you want.
